p: Amidst the compounds semi-/synthetized from marine drugs (some of them are currently under clinical trials evaluation) stand out the Eribulin, a derivate from Helichondrin B, a sponge metabolite isolated in Japan [ 78]; the Lurbinectedin (which derived from Trabectedin) and the Plocabulin isolated from the sponge Lithoplocamic lithistoides [ 9].
